text: Alexander Azov is a Russian pagan author. He translated the Veles Book. Many Russian pagans do not like him. They think he hurts the movement."Соглашение "О жрецах славянских" от 23 мая 2012 года" , retrieved March 11, 2013 ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Russian writers Category:Paganism
title: Alexander Asov
